name: Monarch (Rhet)
description:
Recommended to play in fullscreen (enable with F11 or the lower right fullscreen button). Best experienced with headphones.

The king of Kir Avall is dead. With an ancient evil looming over the kingdom, you must take the throne and lead its people through the final hours. Prepare, adapt, and brace yourself for the end, my Kavaar.

Cover Image: Photo by Payton Tuttle on Unsplash

Developed as part of the Swinburne Media Project class.
